name: Cuphead's Meme School Game (Teddy Bear's Happy School Mod)
name_original: Cuphead's Meme School Game (Teddy Bear's Happy School Mod)
description:
Story: Cuphead and Mugman has opened a school so kids know how to kill memes. And you (some random Joe) had went to the school to get the 8 Ms. Chalices to meet ya girl Monika. But Cup Dude and Mug Guy are trying to kill you like you are a meme. Get the Chalices then meet up with Monika. Or Ingnore Her  and keep the Chalices to yourself lol.

The Guys you see in game.

Cuphead

Mugman

Engineer

Burger King Foot Lettuce

"You Know I Had To Do It To Em" Guy

NOTE FROM DEV:

Post a Video for the Secret Ending on this page k bai.
